docs.lead_paragraph: ATLANTIC CITY, May 3 -- The apparent escalation of an allergic type of condition into a full-blown cancer was reported at a scientific meeting here today.

headline.main: Allergic Condition Is 'Escalated' Into Cancer in an Animal Test; Finding Suggests Some Tumors May Result From Overstimulation of Body's Defense Mechanism

docs.abstract: Theory that overstimulation of body's immunological system may cause some cancer backed by Dr R S Schwartz experiments with mice
docs.snippet: ATLANTIC CITY, May 3 -- The apparent escalation of an allergic type of condition into a full-blown cancer was reported at a scientific meeting here today.

byline.original: By JOHN A. OSMUNDSENSpecial to The New York Times
